import React from "react"; import "./Description.css"; export default function Description() { return (

Description

[Migr-ai-tion.net] is an
applied, interdisciplinary research
project that investigates the potentials of
AI as a participatory and therapeutic medium to
work with the digital diaspora. Situated at the nexus
of migration studies, media and future anthropology and
speculative design, the project tackles issues such as data
colonialism in computer vision, stereotypes, marginalisation,
collective trauma and agency.  The platform will collect
and map a collaborative image dataset, uploaded by users
worldwide for training future computer vision techno-
logies challenging mainstream representations
of migrant experiences.

); }
